name: NSOpenPanel
desc: A panel that prompts the user to select a file to open.

items.name: canChooseFiles
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the user can choose files in the panel.

items.name: canChooseDirectories
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the user can choose directories in the panel.

items.name: resolvesAliases
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the panel resolves aliases.

items.name: allowsMultipleSelection
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the user may select multiple files and directories.

items.name: isAccessoryViewDisclosed
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the panel's accessory view is visible.

items.name: urls
items.desc: An array of URLs, each of which contains the fully specified location of a selected file or directory.

items.name: canDownloadUbiquitousContents
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates how the panel responds to iCloud documents that aren't fully downloaded locally.

items.name: canResolveUbiquitousConflicts
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates how the panel responds to iCloud documents that have conflicting versions.
